entry.title: WIND WARNING , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 1:53 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 10.0°C
Pressure: 99.2 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 8.8°C
Wind: SW 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
